.. _zb-references:

References
==========

.. [Steele04]
   Guy L. Steele Jr. and Jon L. White, ACM SIGPLAN Notices, Vol 39, No 4,
   April, 2004.  "How to Print Floating-Point Numbers Accurately",
   `ACM Portal <http://portal.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=93559>`_.

.. [Burger96]
   Robert G. Burger and R. Kent Dybvig, Proc. ACM SIGPLAN '96 Conf. Prog.
   Lang. Design and Implementation, "Printing Floating-Point Numbers Quickly
   and Accurately", June, 1996, ACM (Philadelphia, PA),
   `PDF Download <http://www.cs.indiana.edu/~burger/FP-Printing-PLDI96.pdf>`_.

.. [Gay90]
   David M. Gay, "Correctly Rounded Binary-Decimal and Decimal-Binary
   Conversions", Nov, 1990, AT&T Bell Laboratories, Murray Hill, NJ,
   `Postscript <http://cm.bell-labs.com/cm/cs/doc/90/4-10.ps.gz>`_.

.. [DayInWeek]
   Calculating the day of the week,
   `Wikipedia <http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Calculating_the_day_of_the_week>`_.

.. [UnicodeMappings]
   http://www.unicode.org/Public/MAPPINGS
